Text: shame that the whole view is very small.. i dont understand y its made that way.. its like watcing a movie in a screen 3X smaller then its suppose 2 be.. all tho the quality is good..

Excellent quality. I don't know what Arvis27's problem is, but it seems to me that he only needs to use full screen, and/or override the aspect ratio (to 16/9), and/or get a decent player. Anyway, thanks, .BONE.!
